::: {#hero-heading}
I thrive on turning complex data into clear insights. With a solid grounding in statistical modeling and machine learning, I specialize in advanced data analysis, predictive modeling, and data mining.

With a robust background in research consulting, collaborative projects across various industries, and extensive educational engagements, I bring a wealth of knowledge and a unique perspective to the table. [Learn more about my journey and work](resume.qmd).
